tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerTransactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE customer_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATETIME,
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
);
CREATE TABLE transactions ( transaction_id INT, customer_id INT, amount DECIMAL(10, 2), transaction_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE customers ( customer_id INT, first_name VARCHAR(50), last_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE fraud_patterns ( pattern_id INT, pattern_description TEXT, pattern_type VARCHAR(50), created_date TIMESTAMP );

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    transaction_date DATETIME,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);
